eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.bonuspack.location

Class POI

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.trentorise.smartcampus.osm.android.bonuspack.location.POI

  • public class POI
extends java.lang.Object
    Point of Interest. Exact content may depend of the POI provider used.
    Author:
    M.Kergall
    See Also:
    NominatimPOIProvider, GeoNamesPOIProvider

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CREATOR 
      java.lang.String mCategory
      Nominatim "class", GeoNames "feature"
      java.lang.String mDescription
      can be the name, the address, or a "reasonably" short description (displayable in a bubble)
      long mId
      Nominatim: OSM ID.
      GeoPoint mLocation
      location of the POI
      int mRank
      popularity of this POI, from 1 (lowest) to 100 (highest). 0 if not defined.
      int mServiceId
      Identifies the service provider of this POI.
      Bitmap mThumbnail
      the thumbnail image itself.
      java.lang.String mThumbnailPath
      url of the thumbnail.
      java.lang.String mType
      type or title
      java.lang.String mUrl
      url to a more detailed information page about this POI.
      static int POI_SERVICE_FLICKR 
      static int POI_SERVICE_GEONAMES_WIKIPEDIA 
      static int POI_SERVICE_NOMINATIM
      IDs of POI services
      static int POI_SERVICE_PICASA

      • POI

        public POI(int serviceId)

    • Method Detail

      • getThumbnail

        public Bitmap getThumbnail()
        Returns:
        the POI thumbnail as a Bitmap, if any. If not done yet, it will load the POI thumbnail from its url (in mThumbnailPath field).

      • fetchThumbnailOnThread

        public void fetchThumbnailOnThread(ImageView imageView)
        Fetch the thumbnail from its url on a thread. Using AsyncTask: must be invoked from the UI thread.
        Parameters:
        imageView - to update once the thumbnail is retrieved, or to hide if no thumbnail.

        public int describeContents()
